name: Mykka
content:
Mykka was a male Zabrak, who lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Mykka worked as a waiter in the bar Spanner's, which was located in the city of Hedrett, on Cularin. He had worked there for a couple of years when the heroes of Cularin visited the bar in about 31 BBY.
Mykka had an athletic build. He liked the clientale and atmosphere of Spanner's, and was good at his job.
